title: About BT Elevator
description: Your trusted partner in elevator solutions

hero.title: Our Story
hero.description: Leading the elevator industry with innovation and excellence since 1990

history.title: Our History
history.description: From humble beginnings to industry leadership
history.content: Founded in 1990, BT Elevator has grown from a small family business to become one of the leading elevator manufacturers and service providers in the region. Our journey is marked by continuous innovation, unwavering commitment to quality, and dedication to customer satisfaction.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Setting new standards in elevator technology
mission.content: We strive to provide innovative, safe, and efficient elevator solutions that enhance the quality of life for our customers. Our mission is to be the preferred partner in vertical transportation solutions, known for our reliability, expertise, and customer-centric approach.

safety.title: Safety First
safety.description: We prioritize safety in every aspect of our operations

quality.title: Quality Excellence
quality.description: We maintain the highest standards in our products and services

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We continuously invest in research and development

customer.title: Customer Focus
customer.description: We put our customers at the heart of everything we do

team.title: Our Team
team.description: Meet the experts behind our success
team.content: Our team consists of experienced professionals who are passionate about delivering the best elevator solutions. From engineers to technicians, each member plays a crucial role in our success.
